titleStmt.title: Of the benefits of our Saviour, Jesus Christ, to mankind
titleStmt.author: Walker, Obadiah, 1616-1699.
R. H., 1609-1678.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Obadiah Walker. cf. BM.
"Sometimes ascribed to Abraham Woodhead, who may well have had a hand in it." -- Madan, Falconer. Oxford books. Oxford, 1895-1931. v. 3, p. 388-389, no. 3283.
